roleset.name: expel gas
roleset.note: FART-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from fart.01-v)
FARTING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, fart.01. Corresponds to VNcls hiccup-40.1.1 (from farting.01-n)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Before starting, for example, the Amis must inform the gods, and during the pot-making process they are prohibited * from frivolity or farting.

example.name: both args
example.text: his farting a loud one so many others could hear him, and then watching all the laughter, was so asinine.
example.arg: so many others could hear him

roleset.name: procrastinate; play around
roleset.note: FART_AROUND-V NOTES: Based on sentences in call home-1. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from fart.02-v)

example.name: arg 0
example.text: She keeps farting around and won't go get them
